f77dd5ce-b5e1-4e60-8e5e-d9e491e307c6.description: Earners of the Level 1 Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) badge have learned the key practices top CSMs use to deliver better outcomes for their customers. With the completion of their CCSM Level 1 training, they understand how to apply the fundamental best practices of Customer Success Management to resolve the real, everyday challenges Customer Success professionals face as they work with their customers.
f77dd5ce-b5e1-4e60-8e5e-d9e491e307c6.name: Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) Level 1

alignments.name: Continuing Professional Development Accredited
alignments.description: SuccessCOACHING is recognized by the Continuing Professional Development Certification Service and authorized to offer 18 Continuing Professional Development hours for all of our CCSM Level 1 programs.

badge_template_activities.title: Complete CCSM-101: Mastering Customer Success Key Concepts
Complete CCSM-102: Thinking Like A Customer
Complete CCSM-103: Designing For Onboarding Success

Complete CCSM-110: Navigating Internal & External Escalations
Complete CCSM-111: Handling Tricky Customers
Complete CCSM-112: Understanding Customer Success Metrics
Pass the Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) Level 1 Certification Examination

skills.name: Dealing With Difficult People (including Conflict Management)

5ec8fc93-7d6b-430d-8cf2-968eb9e37cc4.description: Earners of the Level 2 Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) badge have learned the key practices top CSMs use to deliver better outcomes for their customers. With the completion of their CCSM Level 2 training, they understand how to effectively manage internal relationships and a growing portfolio of accounts.
5ec8fc93-7d6b-430d-8cf2-968eb9e37cc4.name: Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) Level 2

skills.name: Understands How To Drive Customer Adoption

495a828e-56ea-461d-a455-ae9fc9d1bf64.description: Earners of the Level 3 Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) badge have learned the key practices top CSMs use to deliver better outcomes for their customers. With the completion of their CCSM Level 3 training, they understand and can apply the skills and methodologies required to transform themselves into a strategic Customer Success Manager.
495a828e-56ea-461d-a455-ae9fc9d1bf64.name: Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) Level 3

afa26a06-f2ff-4b80-ab62-270cfeeed9f5.description: Earners of the Level 4 Certified Customer Success Manager (CCSM) badge have learned the key practices top CSMs use to drive expansion and renewals. 9f9d1ea3-4ad5-41ff-bb5e-595174ed1d3c.description: Earners of the Customer Success Change Management Specialist badge have learned the key practices top Customer Success professionals use to manage and drive successful change within their own Team and in their customer's organizations.

cb1bb336-6055-4d1e-ac1f-37378491323d.description: Winners for the Top 100 Strategists list were determined by the Customer Success community during the 2-week voting period. All votes cast were tabulated and the top 100 strategists were determined based on their total vote count and influence score as determined by the voters who participated in the voting process for the Top 100 in Customer Success.
cb1bb336-6055-4d1e-ac1f-37378491323d.name: 2021 Top 100 Customer Success Strategist

c369f84e-da8d-4b17-a112-4f1baaf4499c.description: Winners for the Top 25 Influencer list were determined by our panel of expert judges during a 2-week judging period. All nominees for the Top 100 list were considered and reviewed by the Judges with winners being selected based on the impact that their thought leadership, mentorship, and contributions have made on the Customer Success community.
c369f84e-da8d-4b17-a112-4f1baaf4499c.name: 2021 Top 25 Customer Success Influencer

6267df33-0f22-467f-b5ec-f34313cc7be1.description: Earners of the Data-Driven Decision Making for Customer Success badge have learned basic statistical principles and how to use data correctly to make better-informed business decisions within their Customer Success team and organizations.

a7cdbc39-eeae-44df-8916-966d4e89771c.description: In an effort to recognize those contributors who have had an impact, but are perhaps not well enough known by the Customer Success community at large, we have created the regional watchlists. The watchlists honor the contributions of the thought leaders, in each geographic region, who are making an impact but did not garner enough votes or nominations to be included in the global Strategist or Influencer lists.
